events.message: I placed an order almost two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t been updated for several days.
The issue has been classified under Delivery Delay based on keywords such as 'tracking' and 'hasn’t arrived'.
A customer support representative has been assigned to follow up on the delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you track your order and resolve the delay issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the name the order was placed under so I can check the shipment status?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the name on the order is Sarah Johnson.
I checked the tracking and it appears the shipment was delayed by the carrier. We can offer expedited shipping for your next order to compensate.
Thanks for checking on that and for offering the expedited shipping. I appreciate the help and am looking forward to receiving my order soon.
We have updated your profile to include an expedited shipping voucher for your next purchase. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to confirm that your order has now arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since the order was delivered and the customer confirmed satisfaction, the case is now closed.
